attributes.title: this app is terrible😍
attributes.review: bruh i opened the app and crapped my pants🙂 i saw a mf ✨oompa loompa✨ and almost had a heart attack. i started exploring the app and got really bored. then i got hacked and the app erased all my data. you did that💅🏼✨😍 don’t do it again🧚‍♀️💫🦋

attributes.title: this app ✨s u c k s✨
attributes.review: this app is terrible, i opened it and the first thing that popped up was big bird from sesame street. i was so scared i threw my phone across the room and shattered it! i think i deserve to get a brand new phone from uh president trump!

attributes.title: absolutely not no ew gross nasty
attributes.review: i opened this app and an oompa loompa cheeto fingered old man baby was on the screen. i was scared for my life. hated every second of when i has to look into that things heartless, selfish, sexist, xenophobic, and racist eyes. it scarred me for years. ahhhh scary 😶😦😰😱😱😮

attributes.title: Atrocious
attributes.review: This app is blasphemous, especially due to the fact that it is age restricted. It is an atrocity among the App Store and it must be eliminated effectively.
